title: Square Root Property
speech: If  x squared is equal to k , and  k, is greater than or equal to 0 , then  x, is equal to, the square root of k  or  x is equal to, negative the square root of k .
pacedSpeech: If   x squared is equal to k
, and   k, is greater than or equal to 0
, then   x, is equal to, the square root of k
or   x is equal to, negative the square root of k
